content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
One of the best spots in K-town -- I used to frequent this place once a week until the prices went through the roof circa COVID-19.If you haven't tried the hand cut noodles in their Kalguksu, you're missing out - opt for the clam based stew instead of the chicken.5/5 easily.
